Sentencas: The technological feasibility of applying Electrophoretic Deposition (EPD) to Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) has been studied.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here, EPD characteristic of SOFC composition material powders has been investigated from the viewpoint of DC and AC electrochemical experiments.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An electrolyte of SOFCs required gas tight dense coating.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Commercial YSZ (3-8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconias) powders, as for the electrolyte materials, and various organic solvents were used in this study.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the case of 8YSZ (Tosoh, TZ-8Y) dispersed n-propanol bath
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: , the zeta potential of 8YSZ particle showed positive and grain size distribution showed less than 0.1 mum.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: 8YSZ powder can be electrophoretically deposited onto the substrate because dispersed particle has charged and the charged particle acts as a migration onto the substrate by the potential gradient, and dense uniform coating was obtained less than 100 V/cm.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: On the other hand, as-deposited YSZ coating acts as a function of insulated layer.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Potential gradient in the EPD bath has decreased because resistance of YSZ layer becomes higher than that of EPD bath with the progress of EPD under applied constant voltage.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, EPD bath characteristic itself does not change with the progress of EPD.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is suggested that the YSZ powder well dispersed EPD bath can be found by using 8YSZ and n-propanol.
Titulo: Electrophoretic deposition of YSZ powders for solid oxide fuel cells
